job_tasks.phrase: implementing interactive games that integrate AI and real-time data processing
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core activity of building software applications (games) that incorporate AI and data processing, which falls under software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Writing high-performance, scalable, high-quality code that adheres to best practices in software engineering
job_tasks.justification: This directly relates to the principles and practices of software engineering, emphasizing code quality, performance, and scalability.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex educational concepts into elegant technical solutions
job_tasks.justification: This involves understanding business/educational needs (educational concepts) and converting them into technical implementations, highlighting business understanding.

job_tasks.phrase: Implementing robust integrations with third-party APIs and cloud-based services
job_tasks.justification: This task involves building connections to external systems and services, a common software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Delivering high-quality, performant game systems that serve as the primary interface for students in our online learning environment
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation and delivery of functional game systems as a core software product.

job_tasks.phrase: Continuously improving and optimizing our codebase to meet evolving educational and technological needs
job_tasks.justification: This indicates ongoing software development efforts focused on maintenance and enhancement of the codebase.

soft_skills.phrase: implementing sophisticated metaphors that visualize students' knowledge, turning abstract information into tangible, interactive experiences
push the boundaries of educational technology
technical innovation is not just encouraged but required
deliver solutions at the highest level of quality
passionate about creating robust, efficient, and maintainable code
adheres to best practices in software engineering
meet evolving educational and technological needs

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes game development using Unity and traditional software engineering principles. While it mentions integrating AI, it does not detail tasks related to building, fine-tuning, or specifically engineering generative AI models or systems like RAG. The focus is on the application of AI within a game development context rather than the core development of AI technologies themselves.
